entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
